DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the dosage of 0.1% tacrolimus ointment applied on unit area of eczema influence the efficacy of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Protopic Adherence and Efficacy in Korean Eczema Patient
DOC.criteria: at least 19 years of age with a diagnosis of atopic dermatitis treated with protopic 0.1% ointment treated with other medication or topical agent skin lesion on the scalp or hand and foot pregnant women/lactating women
